page.title: 14Exford Youth Club
page.content: Lots of children go to Exford youth club which is held in the village hall.Mr.and Mrs. Woolf are the club leaders but sometimes three other people come to help.It is 15p to get in for one night.The young children stay from half past six until eight or half past eight,but the older ones often stay from eight until nine.At youth club we play games like dodgeball,British bull dog and Table tennis.When we have played a lot of games we have tuck which is normally sweets and sometimes we have drinks. Each year we have to pay Â£1 to say we are still a member of youth club.We start at seven or eight yrs old and finish at seventeen or eighteen. Sometimes we go down on to the green and play Rounders.We all enjoy Youth club very much.
